name: shining
description: This is a detail oriented action shooting game that uses directional keys to move characters and clicks the mouse to shoot. In the game, players can experience a real combat experience, and the game's control and shooting experience are also excellent. To become an elite special forces soldier, players need to engage in a realistic and thrilling sniper battle with zombies in a realistic shooting environment! Players constantly move on the vast map, avoiding zombie attacks while accurately killing losses. Keep yourself alive!
